channel.title: ☆ NoxRune ☆ |• The New Age RSPS •| ☆ Join Now! ☆
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://community.noxrune.com/uploads/monthly_2015_06/test.png.7f57fe724cd9333b79bece3043f57e7e.png[/img]
[I]NoxRune is a 742 server loading present day data. Our goal is to best replicate pre-eoc combat mechanics with loads of new exciting content! NoxRune servers have been built from scratch utilizing the [URL=http://"http://netty.io"]Netty.io[/URL] library. - I do not own this server, or develope it. [u]The founders & developers are Arrow, and Edu.[/u][/I]
[SIZE=5][url=http://noxrune.com]Home[/url] | [url=http://community.noxrune.com]Forums[/url] | [url=http://play.noxrune.com]Play Now[/url][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[center]Before we get into details and media, I'd like to say in my short time of playing I have grown to be very fond of this server, as-well as the owners. There's nothing in the server that's not ready, what I mean by that is there's tons of servers that get released before their player-ready, or there's stuff they still need to do. This server is done, meaning it's thoroughly coded well, and has every function. It has been built with quality and professional code. The only things left to be added really is their own features, and content. I'm looking forward to watching this server rapidly grow! Come join now while it's new, get your head start on the economy! [u]You can checkout the updates here, theere's tons!!:[/u] http://community.noxrune.com/index.php?/forum/60-server-updates/
[B]Features[/B] - [SIZE=1][u]Here are just few of our several features that we'd like to point out![/u][/SIZE]
[ul][*]Endless amounts of monsters to slay! [*]Fully functional Prayers and Curses. [*]Top of the line skilling, including 100% Divination - Expect nothing but perfection! [*]Full lobby support with cross world communication. [*]Challenging economy with realistic prices![/ul]
[B]Selective Features[/B] - [SIZE=1][u]Here are features we have decided to introduce to the game, despite them not being part of the 742 client build.[/u][/SIZE]
[ul][*]Weapon & Shield sheathing [*]The option to choose between Legacy & RS3 stances. [*]The option to view a select set of items as their "retro" looks. [*]Updated maps, textures, npcs, and more![/ul]
[b][I][u]We can go on and on, but why don't we just show you?[/u][/I][/b]
[SPOILER=Images] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DOO0aS0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8m3lEo4.png[/img]

item.description:
@Fort_Knoxx wrote:

[CENTER]

[I]NoxRune is a 742 server loading present day data.
Our goal is to best replicate pre-eoc combat mechanics with loads of new exciting content!
NoxRune servers have been built from scratch utilizing the Netty.io library.

  • I do not own this server, or develope it. The founders & developers are Arrow, and Edu.[/I]

[SIZE=5]Home | Forums | Play Now[/SIZE][/CENTER]

[center]Before we get into details and media, I’d like to say in my short time of playing I have grown to be very fond of this server, as-well as the owners. There’s nothing in the server that’s not ready, what I mean by that is there’s tons of servers that get released before their player-ready, or there’s stuff they still need to do. This server is done, meaning it’s thoroughly coded well, and has every function. It has been built with quality and professional code. The only things left to be added really is their own features, and content. I’m looking forward to watching this server rapidly grow! Come join now while it’s new, get your head start on the economy! You can checkout the updates here, theere’s tons!!:
http://community.noxrune.com/index.php?/forum/60-server-updates/

Features -
[SIZE=1]Here are just few of our several features that we’d like to point out![/SIZE]

[ul][]Endless amounts of monsters to slay!
[]Fully functional Prayers and Curses.
[]Top of the line skilling, including 100% Divination - Expect nothing but perfection!
[]Full lobby support with cross world communication.
[*]Challenging economy with realistic prices![/ul]

Selective Features -
[SIZE=1]Here are features we have decided to introduce to the game, despite them not being part of the 742 client build.[/SIZE]

[ul][]Weapon & Shield sheathing
[]The option to choose between Legacy & RS3 stances.
[]The option to view a select set of items as their “retro” looks.
[]Updated maps, textures, npcs, and more![/ul]

We can go on and on, but why don’t we just show you?
